com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder

Class JsonInputRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder.JsonInputRecordWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputRecordWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JsonInputRecordWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputRecordWriter
    Simple implementation of an InputRecordWriter that writes given user input data to a set of three files (one each for static, sync and async values) using the json format.
